org.cougaar.core.blackboard
Interface Publishable

All Superinterfaces:
Persistable
All Known Subinterfaces:
Aggregation, Allocation, AllocationforCollections, AssetTransfer, Disposition, Expansion, MPTask, NewExpansion, NewMPTask, NewPlanElement, NewTask, PEforCollections, PlanElement, PlanElementForAssessor, Task
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAsset, AggregateAsset, AggregateAssetAdapter, AggregationImpl, AllocationImpl, Asset, AssetGroup, AssetTransferImpl, DispositionImpl, Entity, EntityAdapter, ExpansionImpl, InterAgentOperatingModePolicy, MPTaskImpl, OperatingModePolicy, PlanElementImpl, TaskImpl
public interface Publishable
extends Persistable

An optional marker interface for objects that can be published to the blackboard.

NOTE: at some point, only Publishable objects will be admitted to the blackboard. Initially, however, this requirement will not be enforced: Publishing other objects will work, but Publishable services will not be available.
NOTE 2: the isPersistable method has been moved to the Persistable interface.

Method Summary
 boolean isPersistable()
          Provide a hint to Persistence on how to handle this object.
 

Method Detail

isPersistable

boolean isPersistable()
Description copied from interface: Persistable
Provide a hint to Persistence on how to handle this object.

Example? 

 public class SometimesPersistableObject implements Publishable {
   public SometimesPersistableObject(..., boolean persistThisInstance) {
     this.persistThisInstance = persistThisInstance;
   }
   public boolean isPersistable() {
     return persistThisInstance;
   }

Specified by:
isPersistable in interface Persistable
